Message:
I write...and re-write...
but I still can’t find the
right words to express it.

This heart-pounding joyful
sensation, and the other feeling
that’s sprouting within me...

With a few more days,
this emotion is sure to
start budding.

Just two days left...
I need to write about it
before it’s taken away
from me.

But, when I flipped to
the next page, there it was—

The same sentence I had just
written—word for word—
with the same scribbles
in the exact same spots.

I’ve just been repeating the
same thing over and over again.
